properties.value: Aggregation of the health of individual nodes in the services

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT
COUNT(`HPD:Help Desk`.`Entry ID`) AS C1
FROM
`HPD:Help Desk` 
WHERE 
  (`HPD:Help Desk`.`Status` < 'Resolved') 
  AND (`HPD:Help Desk`.`ServiceCI`= $service_name)

SELECT
  COUNT(BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Request ID`) AS C1
FROM
  `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Infrastructure Change` BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE
WHERE 
(
  (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ServiceCI  = $service_name)
  AND (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status` = 'In Progress')
)

SELECT
  COUNT(BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Request ID`) AS C1
FROM
  `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Infrastructure Change` BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE
WHERE 
(
  (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ServiceCI  = $service_name)
  AND (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  <> 'Completed')
  AND (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  <> 'Closed')
  AND (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  <> 'In Progress')
  -- AND (`BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled Start Date` < ($__to/1000))
  --  and `CHG:Infrastructure Change`.`Scheduled Start Date` <= $__to/1000) 
)

params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' AND name = '$service_name' traverse ::: WHERE nodecount(traverse ElementWithDetail:SupportDetail::SupportDetail WHERE end_support_date AND (time(end_support_date) < time(currentTime())) )  SHOW    (os_type or type) as 'Type',    (version or os_version) as 'Version',   explode(#:::Host.name or name) as 'Name',   formatTime(#ElementWithDetail:SupportDetail::SupportDetail.end_support_date, "%B %Y"), #kind, cloud

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT
COUNT(`HPD:Help Desk`.`Entry ID`) AS C1
FROM
`HPD:Help Desk` 
WHERE 
  (`HPD:Help Desk`.`Status` = 'Resolved') 
  AND (`HPD:Help Desk`.`ServiceCI`= $service_name)

SELECT
  COUNT(BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Request ID`) AS C1
FROM
  `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Infrastructure Change` BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE
WHERE 
  (
    (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Completed')
    OR (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status`  = 'Closed')
  )
  AND (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ServiceCI  = $service_name)

params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' TRAVERSE ::: WHERE age_count > 1 AND ((version defined and not version = "") OR ram defined OR num_processors defined OR os_version defined OR os_build defined or vm_tools_version defined) SHOW name, virtual, type, version, ram, num_processors, os_version, os_build, vm_tools_version PROCESSWITH displayHistory((currentTime() - 30*24*3600*10000000), currentTime(), 2)

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT 
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Incident Number`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Status`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Description`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`InstanceId`
FROM
   `HPD:Help Desk` 
WHERE 
   (`HPD:Help Desk`.`ServiceCI`= $service_name) 
   AND (
         (`HPD:Help Desk`.`Submit Date` >= ($__to/1000 - (7*24*60*60)) AND `HPD:Help Desk`.`Submit Date` <= $__to/1000)
         OR (`HPD:Help Desk`.`Status` < 'Resolved') 
      )

SELECT 
    BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Infrastructure Change ID` AS `InfrastructureChangeID`
    ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status` AS `ChangeRequestStatus`
    ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled Start Date` AS `ScheduledStartDate`
    ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Urgency AS `Urgency`
    ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Description AS `Description`
    ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`InstanceId` AS `InstanceId`
FROM 
    `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Infrastructure Change` BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE
WHERE 
    (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ServiceCI  = $service_name)
    AND (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled Start Date` >= ($__to/1000 - (7*24*60*60)) AND BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled Start Date` <= $__to/1000)

defaults.noValue: No differences noticed in past 7 days

params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' TRAVERSE ::: WHERE age_count > 1 AND ((version defined and not version = "") OR ram defined OR num_processors defined OR os_version defined OR os_build defined or vm_tools_version defined) SHOW name, virtual, type, version, ram, num_processors, os_version, os_build, vm_tools_version PROCESSWITH displayHistory((currentTime() - 7*24*3600*10000000), currentTime(), 2)
SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' AND name = '$service_name' SHOW  name, friendlyTime(last_user_saved)

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT 
          BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.Name AS `Name`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Cost Center` AS `CostCenter`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.Owner_name AS `Owner`
         ,BT_AST_ASSETPEOPLE.PrimaryContact AS `PrimaryContact`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.AssetLifecycleStatus AS `Status`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.Company AS `Company`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.Priority AS `Priority`
         ,BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Instance Id` AS `InstanceId`


FROM `AR System Schema`.`AST:BaseElement` BT_AST_BASEELEMENT LEFT OUTER JOIN `AR System Schema`.`AST:AssetPeople` BT_AST_ASSETPEOPLE
     ON ( BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Reconciliation Identity` = BT_AST_ASSETPEOPLE.AssetInstanceId )

WHERE 
  (
    (
      BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Data Set Id`  = 'BMC.ASSET'
    )
    AND
    (
      BT_AST_BASEELEMENT.`Name` = $service_name
    )
  )

params: SEARCH MonitoredDevice WHERE device_dns_name = '$fqdn' SHOW device_dns_name, entity_id, tenant_id
SEARCH OptimizeSystem WHERE (entity_name = '$dev_list' OR HOSTNAME = '$dev_list') AND BYBENCHMARK_VALUE SHOW HOSTNAME, entity_id, BYBENCHMARK_VALUE

sourceQuery.rawQuery:
SELECT
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Incident Number`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Submit Date`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Description`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Submitter`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Owner Group`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Company`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Organization`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Department`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Impact`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Priority`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`ServiceCI`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Assigned Support Company`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Assigned Group`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Assignee`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Urgency`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`Status`,
   `HPD:Help Desk`.`InstanceId`
FROM `AR System Schema`.`HPD:Help Desk`
where
`HPD:Help Desk`.`ServiceCI`= $service_name and
-- `HPD:Help Desk`.`Status`< 'Resolved' and
(`HPD:Help Desk`.`Submit Date` >= $__from/1000 and `HPD:Help Desk`.`Submit Date` <= $__to/1000)

SELECT 
          BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Infrastructure Change ID` AS `InfrastructureChangeID`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Change Request Status` AS `ChangeRequestStatus`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Scheduled Start Date` AS `ScheduledStartDate`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Submitter AS `Submitter`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ASGRP AS `AssigneeGroup`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`Risk Level` AS `RiskLevel`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Priority AS `Priority`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Urgency AS `Urgency`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.Description AS `Description`
         ,BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.`InstanceId` AS `InstanceId`

FROM 
          `AR System Schema`.`CHG:Infrastructure Change` BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE
WHERE 
    (BT_CHG_INFRASTRUCTURE_CHANGE.ServiceCI  = $service_name)

params: SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' AND name = '$service_name' traverse ::IncludedItem: WHERE type show #kind,name,(os_version or version or instance) AS 'version'
SEARCH FLAGS(no_segment) ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' AND name = '$service_name' traverse :::$node SHOW (os_type or type) as 'Type',   explode(name) as 'Name'
search ModelDefinition where state = 'published' show name

list.definition: smartgraph,{"query":"SEARCH ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' and name = '$service_name' traverse Definition:Maintainer:Element: SHOW #id", "displayName":"#id"}
list.label: Service ID
list.name: service_id
list.query: smartgraph,{"query":"SEARCH ModelDefinition WHERE state = 'published' and name = '$service_name' traverse Definition:Maintainer:Element: SHOW #id", "displayName":"#id"}
